KubeSpawner.image.title: User docker image
KubeSpawner.image.description: Determines languages, libraries and interfaces available
KubeSpawner.image.help: Should be of the form <docker registry>/<org>/<name>:<tag>. E.g., quay.io/2i2c/myimagename:cb5757e7c9f8. Leave this blank to use the default.
